fields.description: Client ID of the client on the SAP system where the table is located. (Usually a three-digit decimal number represented as a string) Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: ClientId

fields.description: The encrypted credential used for authentication. Credentials are encrypted using the integration runtime credential manager. Type: string.
fields.name: EncryptedCredential

fields.description: Language of the SAP system where the table is located. The default value is EN. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: Language

fields.description: The Logon Group for the SAP System. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: LogonGroup

fields.description: The hostname of the SAP Message Server. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: MessageServer

fields.description: The service name or port number of the Message Server. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: MessageServerService

fields.description: Host name of the SAP instance where the table is located. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: Server

fields.description: External security product's library to access the SAP server where the table is located. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: SncLibraryPath

fields.description: SNC activation indicator to access the SAP server where the table is located. Must be either 0 (off) or 1 (on). Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: SncMode

fields.description: Initiator's SNC name to access the SAP server where the table is located. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: SncMyName

fields.description: Communication partner's SNC name to access the SAP server where the table is located. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: SncPartnerName

fields.description: SNC Quality of Protection. Allowed value include: 1, 2, 3, 8, 9. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: SncQop

fields.description: The subscriber name. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: SubscriberName

fields.description: SystemID of the SAP system where the table is located. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: SystemId

fields.description: System number of the SAP system where the table is located. (Usually a two-digit decimal number represented as a string.) Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: SystemNumber

fields.description: Username to access the SAP server where the table is located. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: UserName

fields.description: SNC X509 certificate file path. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: X509CertificatePath
